solution_line_template: If Aaron is {aaron_age} years old, and his sister is {sister_multiplier} times as old as him, then the sister is {sister_multiplier}*{aaron_age} = <<{aaron_age}*{sister_multiplier}={sister_age}>>{sister_age} years old.
Together, Aaron and his sister have a total age of {sister_age}+{aaron_age} = <<{sister_age}+{aaron_age}={aaron_and_sister_total}>>{aaron_and_sister_total} years
Henry is four times as old as the sister, meaning he is {sister_age}*{henry_multiplier} = <<{sister_age}*{henry_multiplier}={henry_age}>>{henry_age} years old.
The three siblings together have a total age of {aaron_and_sister_total}+{henry_age} = <<{aaron_and_sister_total}+{henry_age}={total_age}>>{total_age} years
